Choose a direction, then make a shove attempt with a +8 bonus and apply it to against all creatures within. Creatures successfully shoved are moved 20 ft in the direction you chose. If they impact solid terrain, they take 7d8+lvl (31+lvl) damage and are stunned for one round (fort reduces stun to daze).

item.title: README
item.description: The techniques surrounding using natural attacks, and briefly transforming into animals. All beastmode features are supernatural.As a reminder, ALL special attacks have the [martial] tag, even if it is not listed.Martial effects allow the user to deliver the effect using the attack and damage and on-hit effects of a wielded weapon, even if it mentions using another form of attack.

item.title: 5g
item.description: Increase the effects of gravity on your body, causing you to stay firmly planted on the ground, sometimes to your detriment.You cannot hover or fly. You gain advantage on any save that would physically move you from your position or knock you down. Creatures have disadvantage on attacks made against you that would move you from your position or knock you down.If used underwater, you sink to the bottom 60 ft per round.

item.title: quake
item.description: While this technique is prepared, you drastically increase the weight of your footsteps, causing each one to echo and the ground to shake.You gain a +2 bonus to intimidation and -10 penalty to stealth. The bonus to intimidation increases to +4 if you wear heavy armor.

item.title: roar
sonic-boom
item.description: You clap your hands together with violent force. Creatures in the area take 2d8+lvl (9+lvl) sonic damage and are pushed back 10 ft (fort halves damage negates pushback).Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase damage by d8 (4).

item.title: thunder-stomp
training-arc-su
item.description: Charge your attack so it leaves behind a lingering effect, causing the target to experience the gravity of a larger planet. On hit the target is grounded.As a swift action, you can end the grounded debuff and pull the creature 30 ft closer to you.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase damage by d8 (4).

item.title: crater
ferocious-howl
item.description: Shout at your enemy to create a sonic projectile and scare them off. Make a thrown attack that deals 3d8+lvl (13+lvl) sonic damage. The target is frightened for one round (will reduces to shaken 1).Upcast - Every point of additional mana spent on this ability increases the damage by d8 (4). If you spend at least 3 mana, its range increases to 40/80. If you spend at least 5, 60/120.

item.title: fist-of-the-cataclysm
item.description: Call upon your fiendish patron and punch the ground. An enormous fiendish fist appears above your target and slams down upon them. This can have 2 different effects...Make a melee attack, with a "cast time" of a special attack. This functions as though you were making a melee attack, but it has greatly increased range, deals an additional d8 (4) dmg and an equal amount of poise damage. If this poise breaks, it knocks the creature down. If the creature was flying, they are sent down to the ground in addition any other effects on hit. orLet the patron do all the work as a standard action. The targeted creature takes 3d8+lvl (13+lvl) crush damage and is sent down to the ground if flying (reflex halves dmg and negates grounding). The target also takes poise damage equal to damage dealt. If this poise breaks, it knocks the creature down.Upcast - Deals an additional d8 (4) damage per mana spent. If you spend at least 4 mana, the technique's range increases to 60 ft.

item.title: gift-of-the-cataclysm
item.description: Your devotion manifests into gifts from your fiendish patron. Get a +2 bonus to athletics checks and damage made with unarmed strikes and natural attacks.As part of using this technique, you must make a DC 15 athletics check to break a handheld object, like an apple, a hammer or a trumpet. If you fail, the buff immediately ends.

item.title: gut-check
item.description: You make an unarmed strike or natural attack against a creature, aiming straight for the abdomen while shouting "GUT CHECK." The attack does an additional d8 (4) dmg and on hit if the creature has just swallowed something recently, they vomit it out, negating its benefits or drawbacks.Also ends pregnancies (fort negates).Upcast - For each additional point of mana spent, deal an additional d8 (4) dmg. If you spend at least 4 mana, the creature is also sickened 1, and cannot consume anything without getting rid of the sickened first.

item.title: earth-shatter
fracture
gravity-well-su
item.description: Flex so hard you exert a weak gravitational force around you. All creatures within 60 ft are grounded. This debuff persists for the rest of the affected creature's turn after leaving the area.As a swift action, you can end the effect and pull all creatures within range 30 ft closer to you (fort negates).

item.title: shockwave
item.description: You empower yourself with thunder thighs. You can take the jump action as part of using this technique. Whenever you take the jump action, creatures on the ground within reach of your destination are staggered for 1 round (fort negates). Creatures that were already staggered are knocked down (fort negates).

item.title: wasteland-su
item.description: You use the ink to inscribe the mark of the Cataclysm on a flat surface. Over the course of a week, the curse will spread over the area of the spell. Plants will wither, soil will turn to sand or dust, water sources will dry up and wildlife will perish. In general, the natural terrain suffers until it is converted into uninhabitable wasteland over the course of a year, and a toxic volcanic wasteland over a decade.To remove the curse, a creature must spend 200g of summoner's ink or normal ink made with holy water to write a brief poem or prayer in druidic in a circle around the mark of the Cataclysm. Depending on how long the mark was present, it may take years for the land to recover without assistance.Upcast 5 - AoE increases to 1 mileUpcast 6 - AoE increases to 5 miles

item.title: clapped-su
item.description: You call forth a portion of your fiendish patron to crush your enemies. Two muscular arms overlap your own as you clap a foe within range.Make two unarmed melee attack rolls against a creature with a +2 bonus. Each attack deals 4d8 (18) crush damage. Creatures hit by at least one attack are dazed for 1 round (fort negates). Creatures hit by both strikes are stunned for 1 round (fort negates).

item.title: power-lift-su
item.description: You infuse yourself with the power of LIFT, drastically increasing your carrying capacity.You can lift objects weighing up to 10 tons. The following special attack can be used at will.Heavy Artillery - You can throw an object weighing at least 1 ton to deal 3d12+Str (16+str) dmg, defaulting to crush dmg.

item.title: disintegration
item.description: Attack with such violent force that the target is evaporated. Roll a melee attack and on-hit the target starts to disintegrate (fort reduced duration to 1 round). Disintegrating creatures take 5d6 (17) true damage at the start of each turn and are staggered. Creatures defeated by this damage are turned to dust.If you target an object, you can evaporate a 5x5x5 ft cube matter of solid or lesser toughness, turning it to dust. Tougher objects sustain heavy damage in the same area.

item.title: roar-of-the-cataclysm-su
item.description: You call forth a portion of your fiendish patron to strike fear into the hearts of your enemies. The visage of your fiendish patron overlaps your own as you let out a monstrous roar. Creatures within 30 feet of you take 6d6 (21) sonic damage. They are also frightened for 1 minute (will reduces frightened to shaken 1). Each round at the end of their turn, creatures can roll another save to reduce the frightened condition to shaken 1.

item.title: cataclysm
item.description: You call forth the infinite reserves of strength possessed by your fiendish patron to lay waste to the area around you. It requires a standard action to initiate this technique and you immediately leap 5,000 feet into the air. You are still targetable through normal means, but the distance makes most forms of attack impossible. Until the start of your next turn you charge energy and gain momentum as you plummet towards the ground. To onlookers you look like a meteor rapidly approaching.As a standard action on your next turn, you decide the area you want to unleash this gathered momentum and energy. Choose a 60 ft line in the technique's range. All but the sturdiest objects (adamantine toughness+) within 30 feet of this line are immediately evaporated by your impact, turning to dust. Creatures within 30 feet of this line take 50 bludgeoning damage, are knocked out of the area and are staggered for 1 minute (fort halves the damage and lowers the staggered duration to 1 round). New save every round to end stagger. You end the movement granted by this technique at the end of this line.The area within 30 feet on either side of this line becomes a 30 ft deep pit of roiling liquid magma that persists for weeks, or even longer depending on environmental conditions.This technique is anything but subtle and leaves a lot to be desired when using it as a surprise attack. The impact creates an incredibly powerful shockwave that people might mistake for an earthquake. Objects such as buildings, trees and roads close by to the where this technique is cast are damaged by being in the vicinity of this impact, even if they aren't in the lava crater.

item.title: gravity-storm-su
item.description: You channel your power such that it forces everything nearby to bend to your might. You passively exert a tangible gravitational pull to everything within 60 ft, causing loose objects weighing less than 100 lbs to immediately be pulled into the storm, throwing them into an orbit around you. Loose objects weighing between 100 and 1000 lbs are slowly dragged towards you.As part of using this technique, and at the start of every turn as a free action, you can choose to exert this force, pulling all creatures in range 10 ft closer to you. Any movement within 60 ft of you that isn’t moving directly towards you is considered difficult terrain. Creatures within range can hover or fly and immediately take appropriate fall damage if they enter your gravity aura.At the end of each of your turns, if a creature is within your natural reach, it must roll a DC 20 athletics check or buckled under its own weight and brought to its knees, causing it to take 4d6 (14) crush dmg and gain clumsy 1.

item.title: README
item.description: Caldera the Cataclysm is a demon lord that respects raw physical strength over all else. Her followers regularly engage in contests to prove who has the most. People fear to speak her name or draw her ire and have the cataclysm fall upon them. She has reached the pinnacle of physical strength, giving her the ability to control gravity itself and literally bend physics to her will.Cataclysm spells are centered around increasing and utilizing raw physical strength, manipulating gravity, causing immense destruction and being incredibly loud.

item.title: arrow-splitter
item.description: Using combination of muscle memory and using your last shot as a reference, make a ranged attack, matching the result of the last ranged attack you made (either a miss, graze, hit or crit) with no roll required.You must also target the same creature with it.

item.title: artillery
item.description: While this technique is memorized, all ranged weapons you wield become long range weapons (60/120). If it already is a long range weapon, increase the range increments by 20.You cannot benefit from this technique is you move more than 10 ft during your turn. If you benefit from this range increase before you move, your movement is reduced to 10 ft (applying speed debuffs like knockdown to this new 10 speed).

item.title: butterfingers
item.description: Make a disarm attack with a +4 bonus against with a ranged weapon. If successful, the disarmed item continues flying along with the projectile until it lands, either in a surface, or in the ground at the end of its range. It requires a swift action to yank it free.You can also use this technique against unattended objects for a similar effect.Upcast - Increase attack bonus by 2 for each additional mana spent.

item.title: curved-shot
item.description: Ignore cover, but not improved or total cover, for one ranged attack.High Ground - Ignores improved cover.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase damage by d8 (4).

item.title: dive
item.description: Move 10 feet and get knocked down until the start of your next turn.

item.title: empty-quiver
item.description: Slam your ranged weapon into an opponent and catch them off guard. Your weapon deals damage as a weapon of its handedness (2h 2d6, 1h d8) and has the light property for this attack.On-hit your movement is [elusive] against this target this turn.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, deal an additional d8 (4) dmg.

item.title: flying-arrow-su
item.description: Make a ranged attack against a creature that gains a mind of its own. It ignores all conventional rules of weaponry and continues to follow where you aim your weapon until it strikes an additional creature within 30 ft of the original. Secondary attacks ignore range increment penalties if the first did.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, deal an additional d8 (4) dmg and the projectile flies to attack an additional target.

item.title: headshot
item.description: Carefully line up a shot on a creature you specify. At the start of your next turn, shoot them as a free action with a +10 bonus to attack and a bonus 2d8 (9) damage.If the creature takes cover or you are otherwise made unable to fire, this attack fails. This shot you take has effectively infinite range, only the initial targeting requires the creature be within 120 ft.

item.title: pin-down
item.description: Hit your opponent with a projectile in such a way to pin them to the ground or a wall. They are entangled on hit until they spend a swift action to remove it.High Ground - Effect happens on graze.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, deal an additional d8 (4) dmg.

item.title: dust-settles
item.description: While this technique is memorized, you can trace the origin of projectiles.

item.title: eagle-eye
item.description: While this technique is prepared, you gain a +4 bonus to perception. You can see incredibly small details incredible distances, like a mouse running through a field hundreds of feet away.

item.title: lights-out
item.description: Make a ranged attack, dealing an additional d10 (5) dmg. If this attack defeats the target, regain the mana cost of this ability and reload your weapon.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, deal an additional d10 dmg.

item.title: long-shot
item.description: Make a ranged attack, adding 20 range and d8 (4) dmg. If you graze the target, you instead miss completely.High Ground - Damage bonus dice increases to d10.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, deal an additional d8 (4) dmg and add an additional 10 range.

item.title: piercing-shot
item.description: Fire a single powerful shot, targeting a 60-ft line in front of you and dealing 3d8+lvl (13+lvl) pierce damage (reflex halves).If you increase the cast time of this ability to a FRA, gain +2 to its DC.This technique automatically loads your weapon, and it automatically reloads it again after use.High Ground - The line attack adjusts it angle, allowing you to change its direction once right before it hits the ground (essentially allowing you to pick a location for the line attack to begin against the ground).Upcast - For each additional mana spent, deal an additional d8 (4) dmg and increase the line by 10 ft.

item.title: shot-from-the-air
item.description: Prepare yourself for incoming fire.When a projectile fired from a weapon enters the first range increment of a ranged weapon you currently wield, fire at it. If your attack roll meets or exceeds theirs, the attack is negated.Upcast 4 - Usable as an immediate action.

item.title: tumble
item.description: Move 10 feet.

item.title: called-shot
item.description: Fire an arrow that deals an additional 2d8 (9) damage and embed it into a key spot on the targets body on hit with a variety of effects.Hand - Creatures suffers a -2 penalty to attack using weapons/casting spells through that hand while the arrow remains. Leg - Creatures land speed is reduced by 15 and it cannot dash, jump or charge while the arrow remains. Etc - You can target other regions of a creature's body, such as their jaw, or a tentacle to apply the -2 attack penalty to that attack specifically, or a wing/fin to restrict the movement of a swimming or flying creature.The arrow can be removed as a standard action without issue. It can be removed as a swift action by taking 2d8 (9) true damage. If you have medicine proficiency, removing as a swift action deals no damage.

item.title: named-bullet-su
item.description: Hold a piece of ammunition (not just a bullet) in your hand and infuse it with your conviction to defeat a specific enemy. You must know the creatures name. If you use an incorrect name, when you fire the shot, it has no added effect.You get a +10 bonus to attack with a piece of ammunition affected by named bullet.While this ammunition holds this power, you are afflicted with [mana burn] 3. This does not go away on rest. This mana burn becomes permanent if you fire the shot.You can spend 1 minute to diffuse the power of this ammunition, removing the effects of named bullet from it and removing the mana burn. You can do this regardless of distance from it. You cannot diffuse a named bullet's power after you have already fired it.

item.title: rain-of-arrows-su
item.description: Fire a single powerful shot directly up into the air, when it falls it splits into many projectiles. Make an attack roll and compare it to all targets in the area, dealing an additional 2d8 (9) dmg.High Ground - The radius increases to 10 ft.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, deal an additional d8 (4) dmg.

item.title: reactive-shot-su
item.description: Mark an area with a glowing circle. Until the end of your next turn, you can automatically make a simple ranged attack against any creature that moves into, within or out of the area. Such attacks deal an additional 2d8 (9) dmg. You can make up to three attacks against three different creatures.The attacks must still be within range of a ranged weapon you wield.High Ground - Attacks are made with a +2 bonus.Upcast - Per additional mana spent, add d8 (4) dmg and can make an additional reactive attack.

item.title: snatch
item.description: When attacked by a ranged projectile weapon, roll a reflex save against the creatures DC. If you succeed, you negate the attack entirely. If your opponents general weapon type matches yours (bow, gun) or is a thrown weapon, then you can also fire/throw it back as an instant action.Particularly odd weapons (like the Ray Gun) require a near exact matching weapon to fire back.

item.title: fan-the-hammer
item.description: Use a reload weapon to make 6 simple attacks at a -5 penalty. This effectively sunders the weapon.

item.title: README
avenging-wrath
item.description: Whenever an ally (other than you) takes damage or succumbs to a negative status effect as a result of an enemy, you can make a simple melee attack against that enemy.

item.title: bond-of-protection-su
item.description: You siphon your allies' pain into your own body with this bond. While your ally is within 100 feet of you, you take half of their hp damage (with odd numbers, round so you receive more damage) applying resistances and DR as usual. This technique can defeat you. You cannot take more damage than you have hp (ie if you have 1 hp and your bond takes 100 dmg, they take 99, you take 1).

item.title: boost
item.description: An ally can walk into a space you occupy to use a shield you wield as a springboard. You give them a jump action with additional movement and height equal to your natural reach. If they are a larger size than you, then you need to possess exceptional strength or carry weight to do this.

item.title: its-time-to-duel
item.description: You issue a challenge towards the target to engage in an honorable duel. You and the target are taunted by each other until they deal damage to you, you deal damage to them, or the spell ends.

item.title: noble-sacrifice
item.description: When a creature lands an attack against an ally within 30 ft, you can immediately move adjacent to the ally, become the new target of the attack, and automatically get hit by the attack.

item.title: sanctuary-su
item.description: Affected creature cannot be targeted by harmful effects such as spells or attacks. The creature can still be affected by things that are AoE, they just can't be directly affected by hostile actions.If the target takes aggressive actions, the effect ends.A creature who has been affected by this technique cannot have used on them again for 1 round.

item.title: shield-brother
bouncing-bulwark
item.description: {% hint style="info" %} Must be wielding a shield to use With the shield focus feat, this can also be used as an instant action. {% endhint %}As part of using the technique, take the block action. If the foe attacked with a melee weapon, they are made clumsy 2 (fort halves).

item.title: crossed-the-line-su
item.description: You create a visible line on the ground within that serves as a warning for your enemies. When an enemy steps into a space your line is in, or otherwise "crosses" it, you can move 30 ft closer to them [elusive] and make an AoO against them as an instant action, as though they moved out of your threatened spaces.Even if you run out of AoOs, you can still take the movement as often as enemies walk through the line.

item.title: elemental-barrier-su
item.description: You brace yourself against incoming elemental damage. Choose a damage type (other than true, slash, crush or pierce). Any ally within 10 feet of you gains resistance to that damage type.Multiple creatures using elemental barrier can overlap to grant more resistances.

item.title: shield-bash
item.description: {% hint style="info" %} Special: This special attack can be made as an attack of opportunity. It doesn't consume the special attack on your turn. {% endhint %}Bash your opponent with a shield adding d8 (4) dmg and one of the following on-hit effects.>Inflict clumsy 2 >Halt a creature's movement >Apply grounded for 1 turnUpcast - For each additional mana spent, increase damage by d8 (4).

item.title: barrier-su
item.description: Erect a transparent barrier that blocks movement and line of effect. These effects only apply to enemies and allies can freely attack and move through the barrier.The barrier can be harmed, and has 5+(2*lvl) hp. When it drops to 0 hp, it shatters.

item.title: forbidden-su
item.description: Mark a 30 ft line along the ground within range. A line of transparent symbols or shields appears to mark that area. If any creature walks through the barrier or tries to travel over or under it, their movement is halted and they are unable to pass through for 1 round (will negates). This line must be placed parallel to the ground.

item.title: self-sacrifice-su
item.description: When a creature in range is hit by an attack or fails a saving throw, you can use this technique to transfer the wounds, as well as any other effects, to you instead of the target. You are affected as if you were hit by the attack or failed the saving throw, taking all the damage and suffering all of the adverse effects. Any resistances you have are applied normally, but you cannot otherwise reduce or negate the damage or effects in any way.If you use this technique against an effect that also targets you or includes you in its area, you suffer the effects for both yourself and the target you spared, potentially taking damage or suffering other consequences twice.

item.title: peace-bound-su
item.description: You cause a creature to internally struggle when harming creatures (will negates). Whenever it deals damage, it deals half damage. Whenever it inflicts a harmful effect that doesn't deal damage, the DC is decreased by 4.The caster also suffers this debuff while the spell persists.The spell ends if the creature spends 1 round doing nothing.

item.title: shield-hero-su
item.description: While this technique is prepared, you can cause phantom shields to appear inbetween your allies and incoming attacks. You can use shield actions on any allies within 60 ft of you. You gain a new shield action.Shield Heroism (immediate) - Reduce the damage of an incoming effect by your level.For tower shield's tank up action, you can choose to provide the cover from any position within 60 ft of you.

item.title: shine-su
item.description: This ability can only be activated in response to being targeted by ranged attack. Automatically negate it and have them reroll the attack, targeting themselves with the full effect.

item.title: guardian-angel-su
item.description: You radiate bright light within 30 ft and a tether forms between you and any allies in the aura. You take half the damage for any ally within this aura, applying any DR and resistances you have as normal. For odd numbers, you knock off a point, lucky you.

item.title: power-word-shield-su
item.description: You utter a word of power that bestows a protective barrier around your ally. They gain a divine shield and 30 temporary hit points.

item.title: README
item.description: Niv the Protector is renowned for traveling alongside heroes of the past and making sure they live until the next encounter. Her followers strive to keep the best of the world alive, even at the cost of themselves.The Protector's techniques are focused on zone control, increasing the durability of you and your allies or taking hits for them. Many of their techniques are instant or immediate actions.

item.title: courage
item.description: You hold yourself with such confidence that your mind has no choice but to follow suite. You get advantage on saving throws against [fear] effects.When you pass a save against such an effect, you and allies that can see you gain 5 temp hp.

item.title: fired-up-su
item.description: You coat your hand in fire and deal 2 fire damage to a creature (other than yourself) as you slap it on the back. The creature gains resistance to frost damage and negates the next instance of frosty or wet. It can also remove said status effects immediately.You can also destroy other flammable things restricting their movement or actions, like webs, vines etc.Once this buff resists frost or negates a status effect, it ends.

item.title: long-stride
item.description: While this technique is prepared, you move with a spring in your step and a sense of urgency. You get a +10 bonus to speed while in combat

item.title: persevere
item.description: Give a creature a pat on the back and some encouragement. They gain a +4 bonus to their next saving throw.When you use this technique, any previous instance of it disappear.

item.title: sprint
item.description: Get down on all fours and make a charge attack with 4x speed instead of x2. Ignore difficult terrain.

item.title: bladed-dash-su
item.description: Rapidly teleport forward in small increments, briefly leaving behind colorful afterimages. Move in one direction 30 ft. You can attack a single creature that is within your reach at any point along this line. Deal d8 (4) bonus damage.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase damage by d8 (4).

item.title: burst-of-speed
item.description: The thrill of battle pushes you forward. Increase your speed by 20 this round. Your movement is [elusive].If you do not end your turn threatened by an enemy, you become fatigued.

item.title: inheritors-smite-su
item.description: Your attack does an additional d10 (5) holy damage. If the creature has weakness to holy damage, it also takes the attacks damage as poise damage. If this poise breaks them, they are knocked down.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase damage by d10 (5).

item.title: warpath
item.description: While this technique is prepared, your momentum empowers you. You deal additional damage equal to the number of spaces you moved (aka distance moved divided by 5) this round on your first melee attack this round.

item.title: crash
item.description: When a creature moves into melee range of an ally within 30 ft of you, you can immediately make a charge attack to intercept them. You make a combat maneuver attack against them. If you poise break them, instead of the usual effect, reduce their speed is zero until the start of their next turn just outside of the ally's reach.Your speed is 0 on your next turn.

item.title: exploit-weakness
item.description: When an enemy suffers from a negative status effect that restricts their actions or movement, such as if they are grappled, staggered or stunned, dash to threaten them. You can choose any position around them.

item.title: haste-su
item.description: Create a brief figment of a cute pupper to fill your allies with determination. Affected creatures have their speed increased by 20.

item.title: pounce
item.description: Charge attack a creature and make an additional melee simple attack against them. You can jump once as a free action during this charge.Upcast - If you spend 5 mana you can make 2 additional melee simple attacks against them.

item.title: quick-attack
item.description: Make a simple melee attack against a creature.

item.title: unbreakable-advance
item.description: You are protected as long as you are on the move. You take no penalty to AC from charge attacks. You ignore difficult terrain. During your turn you are immune to damage and poise damage, unless it is from a damage over time effect, like bleed. This effect ends if you do not move at least 10 ft on your turn.

item.title: bladed-decimation-su
item.description: Rapidly teleport forward in small increments, briefly leaving behind after images. Move in one direction 30 ft. You can attack ANY creature that is within your reach at any point along this line. Deal an extra 3d8 (13) dmg on all your attacks.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase damage by d8 (4).

item.title: extreme-speed
item.description: Take the initiative by force. At the end of another creature's turn, take your turn, even if you were previously surprised. This becomes your new spot in initiative.You cannot cast the spell if you've already taken your turn this round.

item.title: flash-forward-su
item.description: Make a charge attack with a twist: You teleport back to your starting position at the end of your turn. The first attack you land during this charge deals an additional 3d8 (13) dmg.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase damage by d8 (4).

item.title: swords-dance-su
item.description: Create 3 copies of a held melee weapon, natural attack or unarmed strike that float around your head. While these persist, gain +2 attack. As part of casting using this technique, and as a swift action each subsequent turn, you can make a simple melee attack with that weapon and consume a copy. This attack functions exactly like making a simple attack with the weapon normally, but deals an additional d8 (4) dmg.

item.title: README
item.description: Cinder Tourneau is an influential adventurer that lived through not one, but two different world crises while fighting to stop it. Once upon a time she had the blood of fiends run through her veins but has since been transformed by a mad scientist and retired. Even when she was a child she would charge at foes many times her size without fear by the side of her parents. The memory of this cute pupper still inspires people to this day to fight greater evils.Pupper techniques are focused on providing useful combat buffs, aggression, speed and putting you straight into the action to slap people in melee.

item.title: backstab
item.description: Move to the direct opposite side of a creature you threaten and make an attack. They are DD this turn.Cannot be used if your speed is zero.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase damage by d8 (4).

item.title: fan-of-knives-su
item.description: While under the effects of this buff, you always have 2 non magical light weapons on your person with the thrown property. They are in your voluminous hair, fat folds or keistered in less comfortable places...You can draw these weapons as a free action any number of times each turn if your hands are empty.Gain access to the following special attack, usable any number of times per combat.Fan of Knives - Throw up to 3 knives at up to 3 creatures within 10 feet of each other. Ignore attack penalties from attacking creatures in the second range increment.You also always have thieves tools in your back pocket, in the form of a single lockpick.

item.title: heart-seeker-su
item.description: Take the hide action. While you do, you can feel the pulsing heartbeat of your foes. Gain blindsense (lifesense 10 ft) until you exit combat or exit stealth.

item.title: kidnap
item.description: Make a drag attack with a +4 bonus. If successful, dash as a free action.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase bonus by 2.

item.title: pocket-sand
item.description: Gain a +4 bonus to your next dirty trick. It blinds for 1 round instead of its usual effect.Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase bonus by 2.

item.title: terminal-isolation
twist-the-knife
item.description: If after your melee attack is resolved, if your opponent has 5 or less hp, you can tell. You can finish them off, automatically setting them to 0 hp, and then move 20 ft.Upcast - Increase the health threshold by 5 per additional mana spent, also allowing you to detect if a creature you strike falls below this higher threshold.

item.title: blur
item.description: Immediately hide. While hiding, your speed increases by 20. This buff is immediately lost when you stop hiding, such as when you make an attack, or are spotted.

item.title: denied
item.description: When a creature attempts to manipulate an item, such as drinking a potion or opening a door, stop them. You automatically slap the item out of their hands onto the ground, jam the door or otherwise prevent the creature from utilizing equipment that can't be used to make attacks or cast spells.

item.title: feign-defeat
adrenaline-burst
already-dead-su
item.description: Teleport adjacent to an enemy within 30 ft.

item.title: garrote
item.description: Make a grapple attack with a +4 bonus that also makes them bleed for 2d6 (7) if successful. While grappled your target is also silenced and cannot remove the bleed.You do not need to spend any actions to maintain this grapple. Your drag attacks automatically succeed against them while grappled. This resets the creatures poise.

item.title: shadow-step-su
assassinate
item.description: Make an attack roll against a DD creature. The effect varies depending on how much hp the target has remaining. Not Full HP - Staggers them for 1 round (fort negates) and deals an additional 3d8 (13) damage. Full HP - Stun them for 1 round and deal an additional 4d8 (18) damage.

item.title: bullet-time
preparation-su
item.description: Enter a defensive stance, giving you +4 AC, +4 perception for 1 round and resetting your poise. When an attack made by a creature you can see misses you or fails to break your poise, you can choose to lose these bonuses to teleport within 5 feet of them and strike them with a melee attack. They are DD for this attack and take an additional 3d8 (13) dmg.Upcast - Each additional mana spent increases the bonuses to AC and perception by 2.

item.title: achilles-heel
item.description: Strike at a creature's tendons dealing an additional 4d8 (18) dmg and to cause movement to hurt them. For every 5 feet they move, they take 2 true damage (fort negates). If the target is DD, this has no save.Certain effects like teleportation, telekinetic movement or anything else not based on physical locomotion can bypass this effect.This wound can be healed with a DC 25 medicine check using first aid, or by succeeding on a DC 25 CL check with a healing spell/effect.

item.title: alpha-strike-su
item.description: You can choose to vanish when affected by any type of effect originating from a creature that you can see within range. At the end of the target's turn, you rapidly teleport and make melee attacks against them and up to 3 other creatures within 30 ft, each dealing an additional 4d6 (14) dmg. You end this flurry adjacent to original target.

item.title: README
item.description: The techniques surrounding using underhanded tactics. High in mobility and utility.

item.title: finisher
item.description: Make a melee attack against an enemy. If after your attack(s) is resolved, your opponent has 5 or less hp, they take 5 damage. Your speed increases by 20 this round.

item.title: conceal
item.description: Take the hide action.

item.title: backstab
item.description: Move to the direct opposite side of a creature you threaten and make an attack.

item.title: bullet-time
item.description: Special: Cannot be used while fatigued. You react instantaneously to fast moving projectiles, giving you a +4 bonus to perception and a +4 bonus to AC against ranged attacks for 1 round. Each time a ranged attack is made against you during this time, you can move 5 feet. After bullet time ends you are fatigued.

item.description: Take the hide action.
